title: Unfair bans and stuff
body:
{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} 
In my case my laptop gets over heated n shuts down n now i have to wait 5min hope this thing is removed really like this game but will stop playing if this carries on
Please check I'm all way come back to play with the group and please unlock Leave Buster 
Thank you 
Best regard 
Mango

replies.body:
I'm copy-pasting my reply to your thread on the NA board;
---
Hey GreenMango,

Leaver Buster is an automated system. If you are gone for a certain amount of time and detected as a leaver then you'll get penalized. The only way to reduce your Leaver status is to play games without leaving them. Once you've played enough you'll get a message saying your Leaver status has diminished; beyond that, you'll simply have to work off your Leaver penalty.

Just because your disconnection was unintentional doesn't mean it was less harmful to the game and a problem to the other players. If you have a recurring problem with your PC or connection, please do your best to see that the problems are fixed before queueing up for a matchmade game. (there are support articles if you need to troubleshoot a problem)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ
---
Posting this thread in multiple places won't increase your chances of Riot removing your penalty. Don't leave games and you won't get Leaver Buster penalties. If your laptop is prone to overheating then you need to fix it.
